latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: School-based child care staff observed caring for children while unhealthy Staff medical certificate of fitness not provided
School-based child care staff determined not to be properly immunized at time of inspection
Floor and floor covering observed not made of appropriate materials Floors not clean and maintained at time of inspection
